resources.string: This allows an app to send SMS messages using Super Duper SMS Manager
Set \"Super Duper Messaging Manager\" As The Default SMS App
BETA: Some apps will work even when SDMM is *not* the default messaging app. \n\nTo enable \"Super Duper SMS\" most messaging and features you must set it as your default SMS app.
This Android Version Requires \"Super Duper Messaging Manager\"

Super Duper Messaging Manager is required for this app to work properly on this version of Android. 

Android KitKat and Lollipop completely change the way that text messaging works. Without a manager app, this app will not work properly. 

However, installing and using Super Duper Messaging Manager (SDMM) should be easy! Give it a try! 

Please contact us if you have questions.
Super Duper Messaging Manager is installed and is working properly. \n\nThanks and please contact us with problems or questions.
Make \"Super Duper Messaging Manager\" Your Default SMS
Please set \"Super Duper SMS\" as your default SMS app.
\"Super Duper Messaging Manager (SDMM)\" needs access to notifications.
Select \"Setup Now\" then please check the box next to \"SuperDuper Messaging Service\"!
